original_title: Den tragiska historien om Hamlet - Prins av Danmark
overview: Prince Hamlet is the son of the late king. He hears from a ghost that the current king, Claudius, has murdered his father. Hamlet is unsure if this is true. He test the king by pretending to be insane and put on a show where the murder is reconstructed.
title: Den tragiska historien om Hamlet - Prins av Danmark
